food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm the color of the sun!
🍌 I grow in bunches.
🐒 Monkeys love to eat me.

food.question: I am small and round and often eaten with milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am shaped like a circle.
🥣 People often eat me for breakfast.
🥛 I am good with milk.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🐇 A bunny likes to eat me.
🧡 I am the color orange.

food.question: I am red and juicy. You can take a bite out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🍎 Snow White likes me.
❤️ I am red.

food.question: I am white and cold. You can eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am found in the freezer.
🍦 I am very sweet.
🥄 You eat me with a spoon.

food.question: I am long and green. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am often eaten in salads.
🥒 I am usually green.
🌱 I grow on a vine.

food.question: I am orange and sweet. I have a pit inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍑 I am a fruit.
🍊 I am orange in color.
🕳️ I have a big pit in the middle.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a cow. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am white.
🐮 Cows make me.
💪 I am good for your bones.

food.question: I am made of dough and baked in the oven. You can put jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make a sandwich with me.
🔥 You need an oven to make me.
🍓 I taste good with jam.

food.question: I am round and orange, but I'm not a fruit. People carve faces into me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 You often see me in October.
🥧 People make pies with me.
🍁 I grow on a vine in the fall.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make things wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You need an umbrella when I come down.
🌧️ Plants need me to grow.
🚶 You might see puddles after I stop.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🌞 I come out during the day.
🌡️ I make it warm outside.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
☁️ I can block the sun.
👆 Sometimes I bring rain.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
⛄ I cover the ground and make it white.
🧣 You need to wear a coat when I am falling.

weather.question: I am the light you see after thunder. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am very bright.
⛈️ I come with loud sounds.
✨ I flash in the sky.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.
🌈 I look like an arc in the sky.
🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ I can blow your hat off.
🪁 I help kites fly high.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I rumble and shake the ground.
⛈️ You might cover your ears when you hear me.
⚡ I always come with lightning.

weather.question: I am cold and icy and sometimes fall from the sky. I am bigger than rain, but smaller than a snowball. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen rain.
🥶 I can hurt if I hit you.
🤏 I'm made of ice.

weather.question: Sometimes, I make the world shake, trees fall, and houses fly away. I'm a spinning storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am a type of very strong wind.
🏠 You need to find shelter if I am near.
💨 I look like a big spinning cloud.
